name: myLumi
0:
”Alexa,turn on the humidifier switch”
”Alexa,turn on the humidifier lamp”
”set the humidifier lamp to red”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
To use your Amazon Echo with your myLumi+, make sure your have the latest version of Alexa app on your mobile device. This will require your myLumi+ app account email and password to authorize Alexa to access your devices.
To get started, select the "Enable Skill" button in the Alexa App to link your myLumi+ account and discover your devices. 
When using the skill, you need to specify by device’s name. You can set the device's name in myLumi+ app. And then you can call Alexa to directly control myLumi+.
For example, “Alexa,turn on the humidifier switch”
If you have any questions, please visit Nectar website or email to support@nectarsmartliving.com for further assistance.
